General.Text: General, 2014, c. 39, ss. 387 to 396 (Transfer of pension of certain employees)

Item.Text: — s. 21(2) deemed in force 20.08.2011 see s. 21(10)
— s. 21(3) deemed in force 29.03.2012 see s. 21(11)

— ss. 21(4) and (5), and s. 93.3, as enacted by s. 22(1) deemed in force 12.07.2013 see respectively ss. 21(12) and 22(3) [Note: but if conditions at s. 22(3) are met, s. 93.3, as enacted by s. 22(1) in force 01.01.2006 see s. 22(3)]
— ss. 25(2) and (4) deemed in force 01.01.2014 see s. 25(29)
— s. 41(11) deemed in force 15.11.2003 see s. 41(17)
— definition “graduated rate estate” in s. 248(1), as enacted by s. 71(6), and 72(2) in force 31.12.2015 see ss. 71(12) and 72(6)
— s. 75(1) to (3) deemed in force 21.03.2013 see s. 75(4)
— ss. 78 to 91 amend Income Tax Regulations, C.R.C., c. 945
— ss. 92(1), (4) and (5) and 97(1) to (5) deemed in force 14.12.2012 see respectively ss. 92(6) and 97(8)
— s. 93.1(5) and (6), as enacted by s. 21(8), deemed in force 01.01.2010, if conditions are met, see s. 21(15)
— s. 99 amends Selected Listed Financial Institutions Attribution Method (GST/HST) Regulations, SOR/2001-171
— s. 100(1) deemed in force 12.02.2014 see s. 100(3)
— ss. 100(2) and 101(1) deemed in force 28.02.2018 see respectively ss. 100(4) and 101(2) as amended by 2018, c. 12, ss. 64 and 65
— ss. 102 to 113 in force 05.11.2018 see SI/2018-45 [Note: ss. 105 and 111 amended before coming into force see respectively 2017, c. 26, ss. 60 and 61] but
— s. 109 deemed never to have come into force and is repealed see 2015, c. 36, s. 71(4)
— s. 145, enacting Canadian High Arctic Research Station Act, and ss. 146 to 148 in force 01.06.2015 see SI/2015-36
— ss. 150 to 155 and 157 to 170 [Note: s. 169 repeals Canadian Polar Commission Act (1991, c. 6)] in force 01.06.2015 see SI/2015-36
— s. 183 deemed in force 02.07.2013 see s. 184
— Division 17 (ss. 232 to 248) of Part 4 in force 06.03.2018 see SI/2018-26
— Division 18 of the Act (s. 250) repealed before coming into force see 2017, c. 20, s. 440(3)(a)
— Division 20 (ss. 253 to 260) of Part 4 in force 05.02.2015 see SI/2015-11
— ss. 266 to 268 and 292 to 297 repealed before coming into force 31.12.2024 see 2008, c. 20, s. 3 (Statutes Repeal Act) see also Canada Gazette, Part I, Vol. 159, No. 25, 06.21.2025, p. 1248
— ss. 306, 308, 309(1), 311 and 313(2) come into force on a day or days to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 314 — Not in force
— s. 318 deemed in force 01.04.2012 see s. 333
— s. 376 enacting Extractive Sector Transparency Measures Act (ss. 1 to 30) in force 01.06.2015 see SI/2015-43
— s. 378(1) deemed in force 30.05.2014 see s. 381(1)

— ss. 378(2) and 380 in force 13.09.2015 see published notice in Canada Gazette, Part I, No. 39, 26.09.2015, p. 2323 (day on which Atomic Energy of Canada Limited sold, under par. 2141(1)(j) of the Jobs and Economic Growth Act (2010, c. 12), of the securities of Canadian Nuclear Laboratories Ltd.;
— s. 385 deemed in force 12.12.2013 see s. 386

— ss. 387 to 400 come into force on the date that is published in the Canada Gazette by the Treasury Board under s. 86(1) of the Enhancing Royal Canadian Mounted Police Accountability Act (2013, c. 18) see s. 401 — Not in force
See also various application provisions throughout

CIF.Text: CIF, 2015, c. 3, s. 176 in force on assent 26.02.2015
CIF, 2017, c. 6, s. 135 in force on assent 16.05.2017 [Note: s. 135(11) repealed see 2018, c. 27, s. 209]
CIF, 2017, c. 26, ss. 60 and 61 in force on assent 12.12.2017
CIF, 2018, c. 12, ss. 64 and 65 and 210 in force on assent 13.12.2018
CIF, 2018, c. 27, ss. 201 to 210, 259 and 260 in force on assent 13.12.2018
